      • getRotationalFreedom

        float getRotationalFreedom()
        Returns:
        a measure of the rotational freedom afforded by this constraint. with 0 meaning no rotational freedom (the bone is essentially stationary in relation to its parent) and 1 meaning full rotational freedom (the bone is completely unconstrained). This should be computed as ratio between orientations a bone can be in and orientations a bone cannot be in as defined by its representation as a point on the surface of a hypersphere.
